original_text: On the morrow, because he would have known the certainty wherefore he was accused of the Jews, he loosed him from his bands, and commanded the chief priests and all their council to appear, and brought Paul down, and set him before them.
korean_text: 이튿날 천부장은 유대인들이 무슨 일로 그를 고발하는지 진상을 알고자 하여 그 결박을 풀고 명하여 제사장들과 온 공회를 모으고 바울을 데리고 내려가서 그들 앞에 세우니라

sentences.original_text: because he would have known the certainty
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 확실한 사실을 알고자 했기 때문에,

sentences.original_text: wherefore he was accused of the Jews,
he loosed him from his bands,
and all their council to appear,
